name: Torrente 3: El Protector
description:
Torrente 3: El Protector is an action, shooter, racing and arcade game developed by Virtual Toys. It was originally released in 2005. It was published by Virgin PLAY. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Torrente 3: El Protector is available on PC.
It was produced by María Luisa Gutiérrez and Santiago Segura. Santiago Segura directed the game. It was scored by Roque Baños.
